answers: To open a new bank account, visit our website and click on 'Open Account' or visit any of our branches with your identification documents.
You will need to provide a valid ID, proof of address, and your Social Security Number or equivalent identification number.
To close your bank account, visit a branch with your ID and any remaining checks or cards. Alternatively, you can request account closure through online banking.

To add an authorized user, visit a branch or log into your online banking account and follow the instructions to add a new user.

To close your account, contact customer service or visit a branch to complete the account closure process.
Set up a new direct deposit by providing your employer with your bank account details and instructions or by configuring it through your online banking account.
